descriptions:
["DescriptionExclusively for sale with LuxuryProperty.com, this beautiful 3 bedroom apartment has full sea views and is available as a vacant property. Located on a high floor in Al Nabat, this is the perfect home for anyone who wishes to live by the sea. The apartment can also be purchased in a fully furnished condition.
• 3 bedrooms
• Type A
• Size 2155 sqft
• Sea Views
• Fully fitted kitchen with appliances
• Large open plan living and dining room
• Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom
• Maid's room
• Balcony
• Vacant
As you enter the apartment, the hallway leads to a large open plan living and dining room. A fully fitted kitchen with appliances is situated on the right side with the maid's room located behind this area. The master bedroom is on the left side of the apartment with a walk-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom, while the second and third bedrooms occupy the other side. The spacious balcony is a great place to relax, enjoy the warm weather and marvel at the stunning views.
Excellent facilities and amenities including a large swimming pool, gymnasium, basement parking, concierge and 24/7 security are all present at the Shoreline Apartments.
The Shoreline Apartments are a group of 20 mid-rise residential buildings developed by Nakheel on the trunk of Palm Jumeirah. Half of the Shoreline buildings are located on the beach and many of these apartments have views of the ocean and direct beachfront access (these are the right-hand side buildings). The left-hand side Shoreline buildings have views of Al Ittihad Park."]

["DescriptionLuxuryProperty.com are thrilled to present this contemporary 5 bedroom villa on Wildflower, Jumeriah Golf Estates.
• Atrium with sunken seating
• Study
• Maid's room
• Feature Kitchen
• Staff Kitchen
• Gaggenau appliances
• Elevator
• Swimming pool and Jacuzzi
• Annex above garage
• BUA 8,301 Sq Ft
• PLOT 8467 Sq Ft
This home is for those who enjoy open plan living and entertaining. A huge atrium, bathed in natural light, features a sunken seating area perfect for casual relaxation.
A truly expansive, open plan, living space contains a feature kitchen area and acres of space to furnish as living, dining and entertaining areas. Large windows and sliding doors provide views across the pool, terraces and onto to the golf course.
The basement contains a massive entertaining room with refreshments kitchen. This could be fitted out as one of the largest home cinemas in Dubai, a games room or used for large social parties.
Four large bedrooms occupy the first floor, with the two at the back accessing a large terrace providing panoramic golf course views. A particular feature is the bath within the master ensuite, from where you can gaze through a huge floor to ceiling window.
To view this home and learn more about this excellent community, please get in touch with us."]
